text: Our Group Deputy Co-Chair, Dervilla Mitchell, talked with Kate Bingham, Chair of the UK #Vaccine Taskforce about engineering a vaccine for #Covid19, and her wider career as a leader in the biotech industry. Watch in full here: https://t.co/9pTix6Eeld #WeAreArup #IWD2021 https://t.co/GGpbI47o35
